casebody.data:
Edgar Arias TAMAYO, petitioner,
v.
William STEPHENS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. No. 13-8358, 13A762. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 22, 2014.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SCALIA

*1022and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Justice GINSBURG, Justice BREYER, and Justice SOTOMAYOR would grant the application for stay of execution.
